body: I really liked it ;( I don't understand.. It was so popular then suddenly, no one went on it.. Could someone please explain where it all went wrong? ;-;
body_tagged: I really liked it ;( I don't understand.. It was so popular then suddenly, no one went on it.. Could someone please explain where it all went wrong? ;-;
title: Elimination..

replies.body: Well. When school started again, tons of people became inactive and started leaving. Elimination also has tons of glitches and bugs currently. Like the compass not working and some players not able to join. This causes the game to get confusing and takes along time to win. Which also isn't fun. Im sure this is the reason, because it was more popular back in the days.
replies.body_tagged: Well. When school started again, tons of people became inactive and started leaving. Elimination also has tons of glitches and bugs currently. Like the compass not working and some players not able to join. This causes the game to get confusing and takes along time to win. Which also isn't fun. Im sure this is the reason, because it was more popular back in the days.

replies.body: if there are 30 ppl in one game it laggs as hell and the server will break
replies.body_tagged: if there are 30 ppl in one game it laggs as hell and the server will break

replies.body: Elim is the best but yeah as Slic said the glitches still need to be worked out, and since it will never be the most popular game mode, it wont be fixed any time soon. Nebula will always be more popular and if Nebula has glitches then they come first. Which it does. A lot.
replies.body_tagged: Elim is the best but yeah as Slic said the glitches still need to be worked out, and since it will never be the most popular game mode, it wont be fixed any time soon. Nebula will always be more popular and if Nebula has glitches then they come first. Which it does. A lot.

replies.body: :( I hope Funky sort this out soon, I loved Elimination!!
